loggedIn.title: You are already logged in
loggedIn.description: To access this page, you need to log out first.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.

signup.title: Create an Account
signup.description: Enter your information to get started.
signup.successDescription: Welcome! We are redirecting you to the dashboard.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
forgotPassword.submittedDescription: If an account with that email exists, we've sent a password reset link.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
error.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters.
error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
error.invalidCredentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

hero.title: Stop putting out fires! Turn your store into an organized and profitable business.
hero.subtitle: A single platform to manage sales, inventory, and finances with full control, from anywhere.

benefits.title: Your Reality Today vs. Your Future with Enterprisy
benefits.subtitle: We understand your challenges and have built the definitive solution.

benefit1.title: Real-Time Inventory
benefit1.description: Lost a sale due to lack of stock? With Enterprisy, your inventory is updated with every sale, automatically.

benefit2.title: Automated Financial Reports
benefit2.description: Tired of spending hours on spreadsheets? Get instant, easy-to-understand financial reports.

benefit3.title: Organized Order Management
benefit3.description: Feeling lost in a mess of orders? Centralize and manage all your orders in one place, from start to finish.

benefit4.title: AI-Powered Growth
benefit4.description: Use artificial intelligence to create descriptions, analyze data, and grow without limits.

pricing.title: Find the Perfect Plan for You
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and scale as you grow. No credit card required.

free.name: Free
free.description: For individuals and small teams just starting out.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For growing businesses that need more power.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large-scale operations with custom needs.

footer.copy: Â© {year} Enterprisy Lite. All rights reserved.

dashboard.recentActivityDesc: An overview of the latest orders in your store.

profilePage.title: Profile
profilePage.description: Manage your account settings and personal information.
profilePage.personalInfoDesc: Update your name and email address.

updateSuccess.title: Profile Updated
updateSuccess.description: Your information has been saved successfully.

updateError.title: Update Error
updateError.description: Could not save your information. Please try again.

preferencesPage.title: Preferences
preferencesPage.appearanceDesc: Change the look and feel of the application.

empty.title: No products yet
empty.description: Your products will appear here. Get started by adding your first product.

empty.title: No orders to show
empty.description: When you receive new orders, they will appear here.

description.label: Product Description
description.placeholder: A detailed description of the product...

generateError.title: Missing Information
generateError.description: Please enter a product name and attributes first.

generateSuccess.title: Description Generated!
generateSuccess.description: The AI has generated a new product description.

generateFailed.title: Generation Failed
generateFailed.description: Could not generate description. Please try again.

error.noUser: You must be logged in to perform this action.
error.genericDescription: Could not save the product. Please try again.

error.title: Error Creating Order
error.description: An error occurred, please try again.

checkout.title: Finalize Your Purchase
checkout.subtitle: Complete the details below to start your subscription.

billingPage.title: Subscription Management
billingPage.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs or manage your current subscription.

authError.title: Authentication Error
authError.description: You must be logged in to subscribe.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your subscription has been activated. You can now enjoy all the features of your new plan.

cancelled.title: Payment Cancelled
cancelled.description: The payment process was cancelled. You can try again at any time.

processing.title: Processing...
processing.description: Please wait while we process your subscription information.
